scripts.fb-start: firebase emulators:start $([[ -d "firebase-emulator-data" ]] && echo --import firebase-emulator-data --export-on-exit firebase-emulator-data) $(cat secrets/firebase-project.txt) && rm -rf firebase-emulator-data/firestore_export && echo $(sed '/"firestore"/,/}/ d; /^$/d' firebase-emulator-data/firebase-export-metadata.json) > firebase-emulator-data/firebase-export-metadata.json
scripts.fb-stop: firebase emulators:export -f --only ["database"] firebase-emulator-data $(cat secrets/firebase-project.txt) && kill -15 $(lsof -nP -iTCP -sTCP:LISTEN | grep 4400 | awk '{ print $2 }')
scripts.fb-setup: firebase login && mkdir secrets && touch firebase-project.txt && firebase setup:emulators:database && firebase setup:emulators:firestore && firebase setup:emulators:ui
